boat.name: Tanyss
boat.full_description:
Tanyss was bought as a restoration project after standing in a field for 5 years full of water, and with extensive rot to her mahogany internal fittings. She is probably over 20 years old (as of 2020) but real age is unknown.

Although pictures exist of her sailing with a jib on a bowsprit there seems to be no onboard fixture points, and since the mast step is well forward she may end up rigged as a cat boat.  She seems to have two forestays, one each side of the stemhead. The only sail she came with is a tan mainsail and some of the rig is missing.

Probably originated as a GRP shell and fitted out by a home builder.
boat.construction_details: Cold moulded clinker style GRP with mahogany internal fittings
boat.short_description: Tanyss is a 12' sailing dinghy of unknown type
